title: Drawing, "Design for a Box in Orange, Black, and Yellow  (recto); Design for Box  in Orange, Green, and Yellow (verso)", 1911
medium: Brush and watercolor, black wash, graphite on heavy cream paper
signed: Signed and dated on recto in graphite, lower right: Vl Hofman / 1911; signed and dated on verso, in graphite, lower right: Vl. Hofman / 1911
inscribed: Inscribed on recto in graphite on orange areas: orau; on verso, b [denotes yellow]; oran [denotes orange]; ul [denotes green]
description: Recto:  Perspective design for a box as seen from above.  On top of box orange squares at lower left and upper right corners and two orange geometric motifs, shaped roughly like a Greek cross, in the center on black ground.  Triangular shapes in black and orange on yellow fill edges of box; verso:  box seen from the top with criss-crossing diagonal green and orange bands on yellow ground.  Bottom and right side of box also visible with continuation of orange and green bands on yellow ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Box in Orange, Black, and Yellow  (recto); Design for Box  in Orange, Green, and Yellow (verso)", 1911.
1911. Brush and watercolor, black wash, graphite on heavy cream paper. Gift of Elaine Lustig Cohen. 2000-20-6.
